item.description:
Join us for, what I believe, is the best Fashion Industry Meetup in the world. So many new members come from all over the world, stopping in to a Boston meetup. We have members who are very experienced in different aspects of the industry, and many who are beginners looking to find help from you.

We also have fun, great networking time, and projects to get involved in. I look forward to seeing familar faces and new members at the next Meetup.

Shirley, Organizer

Please make sure you give us your profile as you RSVP especially if you are an older member before the rquirements for joining. It is very important in order to classify you according to your fashion products, services or even your aspirations and explorations, and to properly set up our Meetups. Let us know what you do so others can find you in our Network Database.

For more information, see my web site [url=http://www.shirleywillett.com]
item.name: The Boston Fashion Industry July Meetup
